on_entry: /execute as @s if block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s cblocks matches 0 run setblock 0 0 0 stone
/execute as @s unless block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s cblocks matches 0 run titleraw @s title {"rawtext":[{"text":"the_cave"}]}
/execute as @s unless block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s cblocks matches 0 run scoreboard players add @s cblocks 1
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s cblocks matches 0..599 run event entity @e[type=ks:floating_text] despawn
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s cblocks matches 0..599 run function cave
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s cblocks matches 600 run event entity @s mushroom
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s cblocks matches 600 run summon ks:timer 0 1 0
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s cblocks matches 600 run setblock 0 0 0 bedrock
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s cblocks matches 600 run scoreboard players set @s cblocks 601
